interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Longmire: The Complete Sixth and Final Season (DVD)
Review Date: 2020/08/01
Store: Robert Taylor  (Actor),     Katee Sackhoff  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Drama
Product Description: ['Longmire: The Complete Sixth and Final Season (DVD)', 'Season Six of Longmire finds Sheriff Walt Longmire (Robert Taylor), his deputies Vic Moretti (Katee Sackhoff), and The Ferg (Adam Bartley), his best friend Henry Standing Bear (Lou Diamond Phillips), and daughter, Cady (Cassidy Freeman) facing the biggest personal and professional crises of their lives. Walt’s job and home are under threat by a powerful, but unscrupulous lawyer. Vic must decide what to do about her secret pregnancy. Ferg struggles to balance a new relationship with his commitment to his job. Cady is torn between her loyalties to dueling father figures. And Henry’s very life is in danger as an old nemesis is bent on revenge. With their world in turmoil, Walt and all the people he cares about most must ultimately face the most difficult decision of their lives: when is it time to pack it in, and when is it time to fight to the end?', ']]>']
Average Rating: 4.9
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama, Westerns, Suspense', 'Format': 'DVD, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Lou Diamond Phillips, Robert Taylor, Adam Bartley, Craig Johnson, Cassidy Freeman, Greer Shephard, Michael M. Robin, John Coveny, Katee Sackhoff, Hunt BaldwinLou Diamond Phillips, Robert Taylor, Adam Bartley, Craig Johnson, Cassidy Freeman, Greer Shephard, Michael M. Robin, Hunt Baldwin, John Coveny', 'Studio': 'Studio Distribution Services', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '2'}
Review Text: I am so glad that this season is out there.  I thought the series only had 5!  I wish there were more, but that's life.
Review Title: Promptly arrived in new condition
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Les Misérables (2012) [Blu-ray]
Hugh Jackman  (Actor),     Russell Crowe  (Actor),     Tom Hooper  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Drama
['Hugh Jackman, Academy Award® winner Russell Crowe and Anne Hathaway star in this critically-acclaimed adaptation of the epic musical phenomenon. Set against the backdrop of 19th-century France, Les Misérables tells the story of ex-prisoner Jean Valjean (Jackman), hunted for decades by the ruthless policeman Javert (Crowe), after he breaks parole. When Valjean agrees to care for factory worker Fantine\'s (Hathaway) young daughter, Cosette, their lives change forever. This enthralling story is a timeless testament to the survival of the human spirit and "an unforgettable experience" (Richard Roeper, RichardRoeper.com).', 'Bonus Content:', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: The Stars of Les Misérable', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: The Stars of Les Misérable', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: The West End Connection', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: The West End Connection', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: Les Misérables on Location', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: Les Misérables on Location', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: Creating the Perfect Paris', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: Creating the Perfect Paris', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: Battle at the Barricade', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: Battle at the Barricade', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: Les Misérables Singing Live', 'Les Miserables: A Revolutionary Approach: Les Misérables Singing Live', "The Original Masterwork: Victor Hugo's Les Misérables", "The Original Masterwork: Victor Hugo's Les Misérables", 'Feature Commentary with Director Tom Hooper', 'Feature Commentary with Director Tom Hooper', ']]>']

profile:
**User Preferences Summary:**

- **Genre Preference:** The user has a strong affinity for musicals and dramatic storytelling, with a growing interest in action and adventure genres. Their latest purchase highlights a continuing attraction to series that feature complex narratives and character-driven plots.

- **Format Choice:** Although Blu-ray remains their favored format for home entertainment, their recent acquisition of a DVD demonstrates flexibility based on availability and personal interest in specific titles.

- **Content Appreciation:** The user shows consistent enthusiasm for critically acclaimed works, especially those featuring notable actors, reinforcing their preference for high-quality narratives and intricate character relationships across various genres.

- **Value Focus:** Fast delivery and competitive pricing are key priorities for the user, reflecting a practical approach to purchasing, as seen in their recent experience.

- **Review Behavior:** The user is actively engaged in providing positive feedback, evidenced by high ratings and enthusiastic comments, indicating satisfaction with both products and service.

- **Re-Engagement Intent:** The user's ongoing exploration of diverse content indicates a readiness to make repeat purchases, particularly when appealing titles are available.

Overall, the user favors award-winning films and series in the musical, drama, and action categories, while valuing efficient purchasing experiences, and shows a continued commitment to enriching their video collection with high-quality content.
